attributes.action: Save our soldiers - Military Defensive Strategy over Military Offensive Strategy
attributes.additional_details:
Our brave soldiers are continuously being put in harm’s way without proper intelligence Iraq’s weapons of Mass Destruction to give a good example.

To some our soldiers are just a number or a statistic easily replaced not a living breathing human with emotion, family and friends.

Our brave men and women are killed or seriously injured for things politicians say that turn out to be incorrect or was known to be incorrect in the first place.

It is therefore asked that the government debate on military procedure that is getting out of hand, prime ministers sending our troops into harm’s way without full support from the public who pay the bills.

God bless our armed forces, for those who have died in war you will never be forgotten and thank you for your sacrifice.

Vote Military Defensive Strategy over Military Offensive Strategy.
